content: Investments Regular Shares Savings Plans (RSS) REITs Asked by AnonymousAsked on 18 Jul 2019If I were to invest in REITS, is it a better choice to do it with a regular Savings Plan with POSB?I am unsure which is better- to do a RSP or a lump sum investment for REITs1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Gabriel ThamLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 19 Jul 2019POSB does not have regular savings plan for REITs.POSB Invest saver only has STI ETF and ABF SG bond ETF.4 comments1

See all 4 comments Gabriel Tham18 Jul 2019For buying REITs, you will need a regular brokerage account.Maxwell Tan19 Jul 2019Or via POEMS. They have a share builder plan now and you may select several REITS ETF from there.
